titleStmt.title: The copy of the queenes highnes co[m]mission
Proclamations. 1571
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge, printer to the Queenes Maiestie. Cum priuilegio regiæ maiestatis,

notesStmt.note: Appoints commissioners to enforce the requirement that men children be provided with bows and arrows and that no person is to keep for gain any place in which unlawful games are played.
Last complete line of text ends: "witnesse"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
